
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is an Error object.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is an Error object.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( new Error( 'beep' ) );
    > bool = {{alias}}( {} );

    See Also
    --------
